pr_title: Exclude otel 0.9.0 that started failing muzzle

timeline.message: Exclude otel 0.9.0 that started failing muzzle

timeline.bodyText: The reason for this is we have assertInverse=true, so it still tries to check against versions outside that range.
timeline.author: tylerbenson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7,7 +7,10 @@ muzzle {
     group = 'io.opentelemetry'
     versions = "[$otelVersion,0.8.0)"
     assertInverse = true
-    skipVersions = ['0.2.2', '0.2.3']
+    // I have no idea why gradle doesn't respect the version range above
+    // but I also have no time to figure it out for an instrumentation
+    // that is experimental
